content.question: Which of the following is true about the values of <math alttext="delta H naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="delta S naught" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi> <mi>S</mi> <mi>°</mi> </mrow> </mstyle> </math> for the process?

choices.label: <math alttext="delta H naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="delta S naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>S</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are positive.

<math alttext="delta H naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is positive, and <math alttext="delta S naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>S</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is negative.

<math alttext="delta H naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is negative, and <math alttext="delta S naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>S</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is positive.

<math alttext="delta H naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="delta S naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>S</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are negative.

content.answer: <math alttext="delta H naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>H</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="delta S naught" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>S</mi><mi>°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are negative.

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
